query: WITH cte AS ( SELECT id, location_id, COALESCE(upload - LAG(upload) OVER (PARTITION BY location_id ORDER BY collected_at), 0) upload, COALESCE(download - LAG(download) OVER (PARTITION BY location_id ORDER BY collected_at), 0) download, last_handshake, strftime($1, collected_at) collected_at, listen_port, persistent_keepalive_interval FROM location_stats ORDER BY collected_at LIMIT -1 OFFSET 1 ) SELECT id, location_id, SUM(MAX(upload, 0)) "upload!: i64", SUM(MAX(download, 0)) "download!: i64", last_handshake, collected_at "collected_at!: NaiveDateTime", listen_port "listen_port!: u32", persistent_keepalive_interval "persistent_keepalive_interval?: u16" FROM cte WHERE location_id = $2 AND collected_at >= $3 GROUP BY collected_at ORDER BY collected_at
